mokada prekshakayo mata nitharama hambawenna labenawa ne wiwidha wiwidha charitha haraha.

parani dambaadiwa shakya janapada walin pamini kumarawarun wisin lankawe rajyathwaya saha balaya athpath karagath namuth indiyawata paribahira wu swadhina deshapalanayak goda naga ganimata merata swadeshikayan dakwu kamaththa wishesha weyi.ema nisa yuga gananak ithisahasa thula sinhalayan washayen wiwidha indiyanu aakramanayanta erehiwa siya swadhinathwaya udesa satan wadi thibe.pasugiya sandhana rajaya wisin yojana karanu labu me bhauthika salasma magin me swadhinathwaya ahimi kirimata pimbauru path sada atha.rajaye bhauthika salasum departhamenthuwe hitapu adhyaksha janaralwa siti je.em.el. jayasekara mahatha mema salasma wenuwen dadi lesa peni siti bawa kiyaweyi.warsha 2000 anka 49 darana nagara ha grama nirmana sanshodhana panathe 5ee (bi) waganthiya anuwa da eki panathehi 4bi(si) waganthiya prakarawada hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sabhapathithwayen yuth jathika bhauthika salasum sabhawa wisin 2011-01-03 dina mema salasma anumatha kara atha.

thathwikathwayen obbata giya palamu piyawara wanne punyage liyamana wadisha atha path wana awasthawayi.
